comments.en:
For this printer basic support is available in Gimp-Print 5.0.x, fine tuning, testing, and support for printing on CDs still has to be done.

This printer has slots for all common types of photo memory cards. so one can print photos without PC. The front panel has a graphical user interface which gives many options for printing from photo cards. There is also a a little color LCD monitor included for choosing the photos to print. Photo download works with kernel 2.4.21 or later. The memory card can be simply mounted as a USB-mass-storage device then. A USB port in the printer allows also to connect PictBridge-compatible cameras, ZIP or CD-ROM drives for photo printing.

6-color CMYKcm printing, printing on inkjet-printable CDs and DVDs possible (not yet supported by Gimp-Print).

Consumables/Refills: 6 separately exchangeable ink cartridges
